The Fuzzbottom Folly — Investment Philosophy
I

Moss Remembers

Every surface in our office is covered in moss. This is not neglect. Moss is a living ledger. Its growth patterns on the north wall have predicted 2 out of 19 market corrections. Those odds are better than Jim Cramer's.

II

Armor Before Alpha

You wouldn't enter battle without a breastplate. Why enter the market without greaves? All Fuzzbottom clients receive a mandatory chainmail fitting at onboarding. $340 fitting fee. Non-negotiable.

III

The Pigeon Knows

We employ no analysts. We employ no algorithms. We have 14 pigeons on retainer. Their flight patterns are cross-referenced with historical moss data. The system has never been backtested because we are afraid of what we'd find.
